post_title: FS: Lot of 10 Low to Mid-Grade T206 - w/ Joss, Adkins, Dunn, Mullin
post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale. These are low to mid-grade cards as the scans will show.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

[STRIKE]Adkins (SGC 2) - $175 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
Burns (SGC 1) - $65
[STRIKE]Cassidy - $60 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
Dunn (Baltimore) - $60
Engle - $60
[STRIKE]Hall - $45 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Joss (pitching, borders trimmed off) - $100 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
Knight (portrait) - $50
Mullin (horizontal) - $50
Poland - $50
